about_the_game:
Kibbi Keeper is a charming, first-person, virtual-pet, exploration game in which the player explores a long-forgotten valley while wrangling adorable, elemental creatures called Kibbi. Bond with these creatures, and immerse yourself in a beautiful environment to discover the fate of an ancient civilization that once resided here.

In Kibbi Keeper, players face a unique set of challenges, from finding fruit to keep your Kibbi satisfied to managing their different abilities to confront obstacles. Explore the valley, find toys, and tame all six Kibbi!

Keep an eye out for our Kibbi Keeper VR DLC, a free expansion for Oculus VR that includes three mini-games to play with your adorable Kibbi companions! Play fetch and interact with Kibbi in an entirely new way!

Features:
  • Beautiful open world.
  • Adorable and controllable companions.
  • 3 Different types of Kibbi!
  • Up to 6 Kibbi in total!
  • 13 Achievements.
  • VR DLC! (experimental)
detailed_description:
Kibbi Keeper is a charming, first-person, virtual-pet, exploration game in which the player explores a long-forgotten valley while wrangling adorable, elemental creatures called Kibbi. Bond with these creatures, and immerse yourself in a beautiful environment to discover the fate of an ancient civilization that once resided here.

In Kibbi Keeper, players face a unique set of challenges, from finding fruit to keep your Kibbi satisfied to managing their different abilities to confront obstacles. Explore the valley, find toys, and tame all six Kibbi!

Keep an eye out for our Kibbi Keeper VR DLC, a free expansion for Oculus VR that includes three mini-games to play with your adorable Kibbi companions! Play fetch and interact with Kibbi in an entirely new way!

Features:
  • Beautiful open world.
  • Adorable and controllable companions.
  • 3 Different types of Kibbi!
  • Up to 6 Kibbi in total!
  • 13 Achievements.
  • VR DLC! (experimental)

name: Kibbi Keeper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-6600K, AMD 1600X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770; AMD Radeon 6950 HD; AMD Vega 8 IGP (Intel IGP not supported); 4GB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Minimum average sustained frame rate of 30fps or better achieved on hardware combinations in this min-spec range. Your experience may vary based on a variety of factors.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-5930K or AMD 3600X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980 or better; AMD Radeon 580 or better; 4GB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: The game runs well on most common gaming configurations within the past 5-6 years (GTX 980-era and beyond).

short_description: Forage, explore, tame, and wrangle your adorable companions in this beautiful first-person, virtual-pet, adventure game!
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
